title: Self-Directed Technology Integration Design Workshop for Innovative Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and elementary-level language knowledge
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented course for elementary school teachers and pre-service language educators, acquiring field-applicable technology integration approaches through smartphone-based learning activities.

learning_goals: Can design 10-minute efficient language-learning microlearning modules.
Can develop culture-context-based language learning scenarios using VR simulation tools.
Can design learner-adaptive feedback systems by applying learning analytics tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
